tool.name: KBMTL Drug Prediction: Test
tool.description: Predict drug response using trained model

configfiles.configfile:
## Setup R error handling to go to stderr options( show.error.messages=F, error = function () { cat( geterrmessage(), file=stderr() ); q( "no", 1, F ) } )
library(kbmtl) trainidx = eval(parse(text="${str_train_idx}")) testidx = eval(parse(text="${str_test_idx}")) Y = test_classification_celllines(combined_matrix = "${combined_expression}", train_idx = trainidx, test_idx = testidx, cell_line_response = "${cell_line_response}", targetid = "${targetid}", genelist = "${genelist}", state = "${state}") write.table(Y, file="$prediction", sep="\t", quote=F, col.names=NA, row.names=TRUE)

param.name: combined_expression
param.label: Combined expression matrix of training and test data

param.name: cell_line_response
param.label: RData file of breast cancer cell line drug response

param.name: targetid
param.label: mapping file for ENSG to HUGO names

tool.help:
KBMTL Drug Prediction: Test This tool is optimized for training a Kernalized Baysian Multi-task Learning algorithm using breast cancer cell line. The algorithm is first introduced here:
Daemen, A., Griffith, O.L., Heiser, L.M., Wang, N.J., Enache, O.M., Sanborn, Z., Pepin, F., Durinck, S., Korkola, J.E., Griffith, M., Hur, J.S., Huh, N., Chung, J., Cope, L., Fackler, M.J., Umbricht, C., Sukumar, S., Seth, P., Sukhatme, V.P., Jakkula, L.R., Lu, Y., Mills, G.B., Cho, R.J., Collisson, E.A., vanâ€™t Veer, L.J., Spellman, P.T., Gray, J.W., 2013. Modeling precision treatment of breast cancer. Genome Biology 14, R110. https://doi.org/10.1186/gb-2013-14-10-r110
Input: * combined_matrix (string): Tab separated table containing training and test data. Genes are in the rows and samples are in the columns. * train_idx (numeric): Numeric comma separated list of index of the columns that contain the training data from the table in path_to_combined. Index 0 is the gene names. Ranges are colon spearated. eg. 1,2,4:10 * cell_line_response (string): cell_line_response_threshold_0.50_large_and_small_screen.RData * targetid (string): path to target_id.txt. Used to filter protein_coding genes only. * genelist (string): path to gene list Trusight.csv. Used to filter genes associated with cancer * state (rdata): output from KBMTL Drug Prediction: Train on Breast Cancer Cell line
Output: * Table of response for all samples in input table.
